akas: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns USA (complete title)
akas from release info: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns USA (complete title)

1.title: Meet the Big Wedding
1.plot: The Colonel suffers a heart attack at the alter. Reggie asks a reluctant Cora to marry him.

2.title: Meet the Postponement
2.plot: Nuptials are postponed in the wake of a near-death experience. Meanwhile, Cora accepts a job offer in Texas, a development that impacts her engagement to Reggie.

3.title: Meet the Super Christian
3.plot: The Colonel finds religion and moves in with Brown in the aftermath of a health scare. Meanwhile, a wacky mix-up leads Brown to assume that Cora is pregnant.

4.title: Meet the Farewell
4.plot: Cora's class sets out to throw a farewell bash, but the party mood fades when Gordon spreads distressing news. Meanwhile, the Colonel contemplates living with Edna again.

5.title: Meet the Retraction
5.plot: Will fails to remember Sasha's birthday, so Brown and Cora help him make amends. Elsewhere, Brianna lands a new boyfriend and seeks Cora's romantic wisdom.

6.title: Meet the Birthday
6.plot: Cora accepts Reggie's proposal, resulting in an unexpected development. Meanwhile, the notion of a new baby sparks jealousy in Joaquin.

7.title: Meet the Taxpayer
7.plot: Sasha faints and is swiftly taken to the hospital. Elsewhere, it all gets taxing when Derek helps Brown with his taxes.

8.title: Meet the Makeover
8.plot: Where there's Will, there's a way: Will realizes that Renee's mere presence improves Sasha's spirits, so he pays her to be with Sasha. Meanwhile, Brown conjures up some magic (literally), and Joaquin has a sleepover.

9.title: Meet the Instigator
9.plot: Reggie and Brown get trapped in a storage room. Elsewhere, Vera fraternizes with Edna.

10.title: Meet the Candlelight Dinner
10.plot: Reggie plans a dreamy candlelight dinner for Cora, which Brown then tries to sabotage. Elsewhere, Joaquin develops feelings for Simone.

11.title: Meet the Break Out
11.plot: Renee suffers through a nasty breakup, so Will and Sasha play matchmaker for her. Elsewhere, Brown is enlisted to endorse a body cream on television---but there are wrinkles when he then breaks out.

12.title: Meet the Other Side
12.plot: A different side of Reggie's personality creeps to the surface, stunning Cora. Meanwhile, Brown helps Derek land a job at the hospital.

13.title: Meet the House Guest
13.plot: Thelma slips in for a stay at Brown Meadows while Reggie is out of town. Elsewhere, Renee gets some cash, courtesy of Will.

14.title: Meet the Trainer
14.plot: Cora provides helpful words of wisdom to an insecure plus-size student. Elsewhere, Derek helps Brown produce an exercise tape.

15.title: Meet the Neelys
15.plot: After winning a recipe contest. the Neely's come to the Brown house to host their cooking show. Brianna teaches Joaquin a lesson about being a sore winner.

16.title: Meet the Bird Brains
16.plot: Rifts develop in Will and Sasha's home due to social networking. Elsewhere, Brown searches for a neighbor's lost pet, but he's more interested in netting the reward.

17.title: Meet the White Lie
17.plot: Rifts develop in Will and Sasha's home due to social networking. Elsewhere, Brown searches for a neighbor's lost pet, but he's more interested in netting the reward.

18.title: Meet the Celebrity
18.plot: Brown, Derek and Renee team up to get a photograph of a celebrity's baby; Will finds marijuana and tries to smoke out the owner.

19.title: Meet the California Dreamer
19.plot: Reggie chooses to stay in California, upsetting Cora. Meanwhile, Brown, having more courage than the others, gears up to teach Brianna to drive.

20.title: Meet the Not-So-Funny Valentine
20.plot: The men are determined to boycott Valentine's Day, but they change their tune when the ladies plan something special. The romantic theme continues when Brown concludes that Renee has a hush-hush crush on him.

21.title: Meet the Forgiveness
21.plot: The Colonel reconnects with his warfare past when the son of a fellow soldier arrives. Elsewhere, Brown gets a medical checkup.

22.title: Meet the Layoff
22.plot: School budget cuts result in a layoff to either Brown or Cora. Meanwhile, Sasha passes an unwanted gift on to Renee.

23.title: Meet the Baby Daddy
23.plot: A man shows up claiming to be Cora's father. Renee promotes a blood drive party.

24.title: Meet the Phobia
24.plot: Will discovers an old friend of Sasha's is making herself sick. The Colonel and Derek try to get Brown off their golf team. He's really bad.

25.title: Meet the Confession
25.plot: Vera thinks she's dying and confesses a secret. Simone tells Brianna she's pregnant.

26.title: Meet the Best Friend
26.plot: Will's good friend, who's dating Renee, brings another woman over, angering Sasha. Cora bets Brown he can't be quiet for an entire day.

27.title: Meet the Home Alone
27.plot: A major storm traps everyone at Colonel and Edna's house leaving Joaquin home alone. Joaquin is home alone

28.title: Meet the Nightmare
28.plot: Sasha becomes jealous when Renee's friend comes to town. Brown is haunted by nightmares of kissing Edna.

29.title: Meet the Hero
29.plot: Brown accidentally becomes a hero. Brianna and Jamal sneak out to a costume party and take Joaquin with them.

30.title: Meet the Campers
30.plot: Brianna goes to a party and lies to Simone about it. Joaquin is scared to go camping so Will and Brown have a trial run with him in the backyard.

31.title: Meet the Product Party
31.plot: Cora asks Renee to do a product demonstration at her next women's social group. They are shocked when Renee reveals the products. A pregnant Simone takes a drink at a party and is confronted by Brianna.

32.title: Meet the Crush
32.plot: Derek has a crush on Renee. Brown gets fired from the school, and cannot return until he apologizes to Gordon.

33.title: Meet the Harassment
33.plot: A woman charges Sasha with sexual harassment. Joaquin writes an essay about the family and his concerned teacher shows up at the house.

34.title: Meet the Replacement
34.plot: When Renee quits, Sasha hires a replacement who's even worse. Derek turns to Brown when he loses his girlfriend.

35.title: Meet the Deception
35.plot: Will is outraged when he finds out Sasha's been secretly taking birth control. An overzealous bill collector hounds Brown.

36.title: Meet the Wing Man
36.plot: Will acts as a wing man for Anthony. The woman shows up at the house. Brown and Edna help Brianna get on the cheerleading squad

37.title: Meet the Seoul Sister
37.plot: Colonel discovers that his first fiance didn't die in the war after all. A classmate of Joaquin's befriends him to get close to Brianna.

40.title: Meet the Neighbor
40.plot: Cora struggles to tell an intrusive neighbor, no. Joaquin sabotages Brianna just as a college recruiter comes to visit.

41.title: Meet the Alternative
41.plot: Darnell is uncomfortable when Cora invites him to bible study and the church lady hits on him. Simone contemplates putting her baby up for adoption.

43.title: Meet the Old Fling
43.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

44.title: Meet the Unwelcome Back
44.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

45.title: Meet the New Reggie
45.plot: Derek and Mr. Brown advise Reggie about caring about his appearance if he's going to date Cora. Renee becomes distraught when she learns an old fling Michael is HIV positive and angry at Sascha as she already was aware.

46.title: Meet the Sugar Mama
46.plot: Derek meets wealthy Claudia who takes him away from his studies with expensive gifts. Renee fills in at the school health fair and clashes with Cora when she hands out condoms to the students.

48.title: Meet the Non-Frequent Flyer
48.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

49.title: Meet the Football Coach
49.plot: Simone introduces her mom - who wants Simone to marry the father of her child, Josh - to Sasha. Cora takes over the football team and they win their first game.

50.title: Meet the Shopaholic
50.plot:

51.title: Meet the Patience
51.plot:
Know what this is about?

52.title: Meet the Dealmaker

1.title: Meet Brown Meadows
1.plot: Brown gets way more than he bargained for as he tries to follow Pop Brown's dying wish that he "take care of the old", by opening a retirement home for seniors. Husband & wife Will and Sasha, try to help Brown, but Brown is overwhelmed when the residents of a nearby seniors home are brought to the house after a fire.

2.title: Meet London and the Competition
2.plot: Brown has been arrested at the airport for saying "bomb" and goes to jail. While he's in jail, Sasha and Cora interview people for the handyman position. When Will comes home with Brown, he talks about his experience in jail. Another handyman, Jesus, comes by to interview, fixes things around the house and gets the job.

3.title: Meet the Dependents and the Divas
3.plot: Carmen asks Sasha and Will to be foster parents, and we meet Brianna (15) and Joaquin (8). Will and Sasha hesitate because they are so busy with their work, but Cora offers to help by letting the kids stay at Brown's house as long as they need to. We see the first signs that Brianna is very troubled. Precocious Joaquin fits right in at the house. London and Miss Daisy have a Battle of the Divas.

4.title: Meet My Family
4.plot: The Colonel's daughter, Karen, comes to see him. This gives Brown the idea to plan a Friends and Family day so all of the residents can have visitors. The Colonel is upset with Karen because she put him in a retirement home. She explains, her reason for doing so was because he seemed to become depressed and withdrawn from the world since the death of her mother.

5.title: Meet My Maker
5.plot: After learning that her childhood friend has died broke and alone, Ms. Edna becomes very depressed and says she's lost the will to live. Cora is shocked and gets the residents to do a "This is Your Life" night to show Edna just how appreciated and cherished she is. Brown mistakenly thinks JesÃºs is gay after overhearing that Will found him "in the closet".

6.title: Meet the Babies
6.plot: Brianna brings home a very pregnant friend who wants to take resident at Brown Meadows. Miss Daisy goes missing!

7.title: Meet the Dangerous and the Deadline
7.plot: A former boyfriend who put Sasha in the hospital gets out of prison and Mr. Brown has till the end of the day to find a winning raffle ticket that London lost while cleaning.

8.title: Meet the Faithless and the Faithful
8.plot: Mr. Brown hopes to put together a winning combo for a singing contest and Cora gets a visit from a friend who is having marital difficulties.

9.title: Meet the Truth
9.plot: Brianna has been acting out a lot at school and is suspended for threatening some kids who were bullying Joaquin. Sasha, Will, and Carmen try to find out what is bothering her. Will and Carmen aren't successful, but Sasha finally uncovers Brianna's secret...Brianna reveals to Sasha that she was sexually abused by her mother's boyfriend.

10.title: Meet the Future
10.plot: Cora and Russell have gone on several more dates. Cora is very smitten with him. London, Daisy and Edna spy on Cora and Russell whenever he comes over. Brown becomes afraid that Cora will fall in love with Russell, move away, leaving him all alone. Brown interrogates Russell, and Russell is scared away.

1.title: Meet the Parents
1.plot: Sasha and Will try to adopt Brianna and Joaquin *after* they have been placed in a home. Also the Colonel tells Mr. Brown the neighboring frat house is growing marijuana.

3.title: Meet the Profits
3.plot: Brown starts charging the residents (and Cora) for amenities around the house - and it gets WAY out of hand: pay toilet, vending machine in the kitchen, parking meters, etc. The residents plot their revenge on Brown. Meanwhile, Will feels threatened when Sasha is offered a job that pays more than he makes.

4.title: Meet the Class
4.plot: Cora gets a job substitute teaching, thinking she'll be teaching "little angels". But she is tested when she's assigned some of the toughest students in the school. Meanwhile, Brown and London compete in a "fashion showdown" for a NY designer.

5.title: Meet Mommie Dearest
5.plot: Brianna and Joaquin's mother (Tanya) returns from jail. She finds out Will and Sasha are planning to adopt the kids, but she's determined to get them back so she can live off the welfare checks from her kids. Meanwhile, the Colonel starts taking the "little blue pill" to improve his romantic life only for Brown to accidentally take a handful and he's up all night.

6.title: Meet Career Day
6.plot: Will convinces Brianna to let him come to "Career Day" at her class, since her real father is in prison. She agrees, but is terribly disappointed when Will can't come because of an emergency at the hospital. Brown tries to fill in for Will, and it's...interesting. Brown decides to change his flamboyant ways, after his Career Day appearance, and acts and dresses much more conservatively.

7.title: Meet the Matchmaker
7.plot: Will and Sasha are determined to fight Tanya, and keep her from taking the kids. Meanwhile, London and Jesus continue their love/hate relationship.

8.title: Meet the Cousins
8.plot: Will has a lot of explaining to do when Sasha discovers photos on his cell phone from a bachelor party. Meanwhile, Mr. Brown searches his family tree and finds out that Mrs. Daisy's ancestors owned his family.

9.title: Meet the Body
9.plot: Brown is driving everyone crazy, preparing for the arrival of a magazine reporter who's doing an article on the house. Right before the reporter arrives, Edna informs Brown that her lover has died up in her room, and the residents have to try to get rid of the body before the reporter finds out. Brianna rejects Sasha's mothering efforts, when Sasha buys her a fancy dress for the upcoming cotillion

10.title: Meet the Mexican
10.plot: When his father visits, Jesus enlists the others to make his father believe that he is a successful lawyer with a cook, a maid and a butler. Also London is expecting a visit from her father.

11.title: Meet the Entrepreneur
11.plot: Everyone advises Brown to market the recipe to his delicious barbecue sauce. After Joaquim interrupts an amorous encounter between Will and Sasha, Will expresses doubts about adopting to Brown - and is overheard by Brianna.

13.title: Meet the E.R.
13.plot: Brown is winged (grazed by a bullet) while arguing over food at a restaurant. He uses guilt to get waited on hand and foot but the stress of caring for him reveals a more serious medical condition in his caretaker.

14.title: Meet the Secret
14.plot: Brown is advised to make out a will and all is well until the Colonel infects Brown with paranoia fears about Cora killing him to inherit early. Will and Sasha learn about a secret between Joaquin and his baseball coach, Eddie.

15.title: Meet the Intervention
15.plot: After being given a lottery ticket which happens to be a $20 winner, Brown develops lotto fever and gambles away the money for the electric bill. Abuse in Brianna's past stops her from accepting a potential boyfriend.

16.title: Meet the New Job
16.plot: Cora is given a full-time teaching job at the high school by the attractive principal, Mr. Hughes, and is immediately challenged when troublesome Angie shows up to class, drunk. After discovering he's lost his nest egg, the Colonel has to try to get a job.

17.title: Meet the Cougars
17.plot: Brianna is plagued with boy troubles, as her young beau falls for Sasha. Meanwhile, when Edna's date for the theater falls ill, his nephew goes out with her instead.

20.title: Meet the Thief
20.plot: A local burglary prompts the Colonel, Will and Jesus to launch a neighborhood watch group.

21.title: Meet the Sweet Tooth
21.plot: Sasha helps Cora lose weight; Brown convinces residents to sell candy to try to win a vacation.

22.title: Meet the Matrimony
22.plot: Edna returns home with news that she's engaged; Will agrees to appear on a calendar at the hospital for charity.

23.title: Meet the Man and the Mouse
23.plot: Fed up with their lack of privacy, Will and Sasha decide to move out of Brown Meadows. Brown and the Colonel go to war in the house against a mouse.

24.title: Meet the Real Dad
24.plot: Brianna and Joaquin's dad gets out of prison, and shows up at the house. The Colonel reveals to Brown that he has fallen for Edna, and with Brown's help the Colonel makes his move.

25.title: Meet the Hubby
25.plot: Brianna and Joaquin's dad gets out of prison, and shows up at the house. Brianna must face who her father really is, not who she's imagined him to be all these years. The Colonel reveals to Brown that he has fallen for Edna, and with Brown's help the Colonel makes his move.

26.title: Meet the H.B.I.C.
26.plot: Cora and Sasha have a domestic power struggle when they clash over who rules the household. Elsewhere, Brown Meadows has a safety check when Brown runs an emergency-preparedness drill.

27.title: Meet the Troublemaker
27.plot: A student who is being bullied brings a gun to Cora's classroom. London is saddened when she realizes her probation is almost over and she'll be leaving Brown Meadows.

30.title: Meet the Two Left Feet
30.plot: An overwhelmed Sasha has a night out and comes home tipsy to Brianna's shock. Brown and the Colonel attend an art class but to Brown's surprise Colonel is the model.

39.title: Meet the Naked Truth
39.plot: An overwhelmed Sasha has a night out and comes home tipsy to Brianna's shock. Brown and the Colonel attend an art class but to Brown's surprise Colonel is the model.

2.title: Meet the Lessons
2.plot: Will has a secret: He takes hush-hush salsa-dancing lessons in an effort to take Sasha out to a party, but Sasha suspects he's spending the time cheating on her. Meanwhile, the Colonel and Edna hope to leave Brown Meadows and move in together elsewhere.

3.title: Meet the Disorderly
3.plot: Simone is attacked by one of the frat boys at a party; Brown decides to fire Jesus to save money.

4.title: Meet the Mom
4.plot: When Will falls ill, his mother (Jenifer Lewis) arrives, but her old-school, Southern-style remedies are a bitter pill to swallow for Sasha. And Daisy goes missing, a development made more serious considering her declining mental state.

5.title: Meet the Great Guy
5.plot: Accusations of blame are directed at Will when Joaquin's ex-baseball coach dies on his operating table. Meanwhile, gym teacher Reggie (Maurice G. Jones) sets out to woo Cora, but Brown doesn't feel Reggie makes the grade.

6.title: Meet the Saboteurs
6.plot: Will faces a board hearing at the hospital. Mr. Brown and Cora try reverse psychology on each other regarding Cora's relationship with Reggie.

7.title: Meet the Couch Potato
7.plot: When Will is suspended from work, his wife can't get him off the couch.

8.title: Meet Mr. Wrong
8.plot: Decades since they last saw each other, Daisy's cousin Lorraine comes to visit. Cora feels Reggie treats her like a servant.

9.title: Meet the Christmas Spirit
9.plot: Brown and Curtis battle over who gets to play Santa as they put on a Christmas play for the children at the hospital. Meanwhile, Joaquin befriends a young boy who is sick.

10.title: Meet the Mom Again
10.plot: Will's mother (Jenifer Lewis) arrives to spread cheer to her son---but she shows up with his former fiancÃ©e. Meanwhile, Brianna is cast in the role of a parent as part of a school assignment.

11.title: Meet the Lovers
11.plot: A fellow doctor makes a pass at Sasha and threatens to lie about Will who is on suspension if she does not keep quiet. Brown gets a temporary job as a security guard / hall monitor at the school where Cora teaches.

12.title: Meet the Tension
12.plot: Edna breaks off her engagement to the Colonel and returns to the house. In the meantime, a reinstated Will plans a celebration dinner and invites Troy (Richard F. Whiten), upsetting Sasha.

13.title: Meet the Wills
13.plot: The results of Sasha's mammogram cause an odd reaction from Will. Meanwhile, the privileged and well-tended London learns about being poor after her father blocks her cash flow.

14.title: Meet the Consequences
14.plot: Sasha tells Will about Troy kissing her. Joaquin blackmails Brianna.

15.title: Meet the Bully
15.plot: A student who is being bullied brings a gun to Cora's classroom. London is saddened when she realizes her probation is almost over and she'll be leaving Brown Meadows.

16.title: Meet Your Match
16.plot: Brown secretly sets Cora up on a date through an online dating website after he starts feeling guilty about causing Russell to flee. Elsewhere, Miss Daisy gets a little help for her audition from Jesus and London but, predictably, things don't work out quite as planned

17.title: Meet the Church Board
17.plot: Will and Sasha's troubles run deeper in light of Will's reluctance to address the situation. In the meantime, Cora and Brown square off over a church-board post.

18.title: Meet the Test
18.plot: Brown and Derek take a defensive driving course.

19.title: Meet the Protest
19.plot: Tanya makes romantic overtures toward Will. Elsewhere, Brown is enlisted to resolve a school protest.

20.title: Meet the Bump and Grind
20.plot: Will and Sasha suspect that Brianna is pregnant. In the meantime, Brown plans a bachelor party for the Colonel

21.title: Meet the Fake ID
21.plot: Brianna is caught red-handed with false identification. And it's a "Mr. Mom" romp when Brown and Will fall into roles as househusbands.

22.title: Meet the Other Man
22.plot: Sasha's mom visits... with another man. Also Cora deals with a football player who needs to retake a test.

23.title: Meet the Double Date
23.plot: Cora and Reggie try to put their parents together to keep them from coming on their dates. Also Sasha regrets telling blabbermouth Renee one of Will's secrets.

24.title: Meet the Alter Ego
24.plot: After a bump on the head Brown is well spoken, analytical and dresses almost like a human. But he's too "bougie" for the others.

25.title: Meet the Anniversary
25.plot: On Will and Sasha's anniversary, Sasha's dad and Will's mom hit if off a little too well. Reggie is bothered by Cora spending time with Gordon.

26.title: Meet My Fair Tanya
26.plot: Tanya gets help from Sasha on becoming a lady. The Colonel is depressed when he finds out he is the last living member of his platoon.

27.title: Meet the Stand Up
27.plot: Brown becomes a stand-up comedian, and uses the family's problems for jokes. The family finds out that Joanquin has an IQ higher than everyone else's.

28.title: Meet the Counseling Session
28.plot: Colonel Jackson tries to mediate an argument between Brown and Cora. Will and Sasha try to prove their relationship is more than just physical by giving up sex.

29.title: Meet the Mugger
29.plot: Cora gets mugged and becomes overprotective and paranoid. Will finds a gray hair and begins acting young.

30.title: Meet the Stakeout
30.plot: Brown's new neighbors may be thieves. Brown lets the police use his house for a stakeout. Brianna comes to help Sasha at the hospital and winds up befriending Renee.

31.title: Meet the Cheating Liver
31.plot: Cora suspects Reggie of cheating on her. Renee misplaces a liver needed for a transplant operation.

32.title: Meet the Loot
32.plot: Brown and Cora loan the Colonel a dollar which he uses to buy a lottery ticket. The ticket hits and everyone fights over splitting the winnings. Sasha and Renee decide to switch jobs. Sasha can't handle Renee's job, and Renee excels.

33.title: Meet the Bucket List
33.plot: Brown and Colonel Jackson make a bucket list. Will and Sasha think it might be time to tell Joaquin about the birds and the bees.

34.title: Meet the Racist
34.plot: An elderly black patient refuses to be operated on by Will because he's black. Brown finds out that Cora never went to the prom. He decides to create a prom in the living room.

35.title: Meet the Stepdaughter
35.plot: Edna and the Colonel's daughter, Karen, bump heads when Karen wants Edna to sigh a prenup. Meanwhile, Brown and Derek take an exercise class.

36.title: Meet the Baby
36.plot: Vera stays at the Brown house while she recovers from laser eye surgery. Sasha finds out she's pregnant and she and Will try to keep it a secret.

37.title: Meet the Scholarship
37.plot: Derek loses his scholarship and must work at the house to earn money and he takes advantage. Joaquin likes a girl at school and thugs out when Brianna tells him girls like bad boys

38.title: Meet the Boyfriend
38.plot: Brianna falls in love for the first time with a dangerous looking thug. Meanwhile, Cora has to teach sex education.

39.title: Meet the Secret Admirer
39.plot: Gordon has feelings for Cora; Derek and his fraternity brothers invade the Browns' home.

40.title: Meet the Job Offer
40.plot: Cora gets a job offer in a new city; Joaquin records things with his new camera.

2.title: Meet the Knock-Off
2.plot: Cora tries to pass an expensive purse she bought as a cheap knock-off. Brown suspects Yvonne is selling more than just candy.

3.title: Meet the Reunion
3.plot: Leroy Brown is estactic to provide the entertainment for his high school reunion. Then a famous alumni agrees to attend and Brown is replaced. Renee learns Joaquin can pick sports winners and consults him before betting on teams.

4.title: Meet the Whodunit
4.plot:

6.title: Meet the Hustle

7.title: Meet the Switch
7.plot: Will and Joaquin magically switch bodies after Joaquin wished to be an adult. Mr. Brown tries to get in contact with the electric company regarding his electric bill.

-1.title: Meet the Country Cousin

imdb.title: Meet the Browns
plot: For Cora Simmons, living at home as a grown adult has its challenges. Especially when you have Mr. Brown as a daddy.
